Detailed Description

A factory that loads Mpg123Sources from file and stream.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Mpg123Loader::Mpg123Loader ( bool  setup = true  ) 

Sets up libmpg123 for you, and closes it on destruction. If you want to do this yourself, send setup=false.
